content: TE-Y-BK SDS Max Rotary hammer core bit SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer core bit for cutting holes in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Dry drilling with 20% longer lifetime than other SDS Max percussion core bits Virtually dustless drilling when used with the optional TE DRS-Y dust removal system for Y-type combihammers Easy socket cutting and drilling penetrations in masonry Improved core bit geometry for up to 20% longer life Improved core bit geometry for up to 20% longer life Applications Socket cutting Througth-holes for water piping, ventilation and other utilities ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Base material: Concrete, Brick, Masonry, Limestone System parts: No Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Base material | Concrete, Brick, Masonry, Limestone | Working mode | Hammer drilling, Drilling | System parts | No | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2006301 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 45/290 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006302 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 45/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006303 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 50/290 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006304 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 50/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006307 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 68/290 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006308 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 68/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006306 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 55/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006313 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 100/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006311 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 90/290 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006312 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 90/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006309 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 82/290 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006310 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 82/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006314 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 125/550 - Package Size 1 pc - 2006315 - Core bit TE-Y-BK 150/550 - Package Size 1 pc
